pages.text: Works very much like its $(l:equipment/lesser_potion_pendant)little brother$(/l).$(br)However, this version has three chambers, each of which can be filled with a different potion - which also means it can only support effects of level I.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Use the $(l:brewing/potion_workshop)Potion Workshop$(/l) to infuse it, by placing it where the $(item)Bottle$() would normally go.$(br2)To clear its effect, put it in a crafting grid.
